column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////You do get a large whole egg at Jinya
column2: but the egg has been way overcooked for me every time I've been here
column4: rubbery whites. I actually thought it was a hard-boiled egg at first
column6: the egg is a smaller half
column7: but it's cooked perfectly with a fantastic runny yolk and soft white.
